001    package edu.rit.se.ryan;
002    
003    import java.io.BufferedReader;
004    import java.io.IOException;
005    import java.io.InputStreamReader;
006    
007    public class Foo {
008    
009            private static final String hello = "Hello World";
010            //Ben was here to test
011            public String getMessage() {
012                    return hello;
013            }
014    
015            public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
016                    System.out.println(new Foo().getMessage());
017                    System.out.println(new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(ClassLoader
018                                    .getSystemClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("foo.properties")))
019                                    .readLine());
020            }
021    }
